extension.description: SQL Optimizer, Index Advisor for MySQL/PostgreSQL/Oracle/openGauss and etc, Tune SQL by Clicks
config.initialization.title: PawSQL Engine Setup
config.initialization.description: Set up the URL of PawSQL Engine and ApiKey for user
config.initialization.apiKey.description: ApiKey for this user to use PawSQL Engine
config.initialization.apiKey.markdownDes: ApiKey for this user to use PawSQL Engine. You can find it in your PawSQL account settings menu.
config.initialization.backendUrl.descrip: URL of the PawSQL Engine service
config.initialization.backendUrl.markdow: The URL for PawSQL Engine service.
config.initialization.frontendUrl.descri: URL of the PawSQL front page
config.initialization.frontendUrl.markdo: The base URL for PawSQL front page to display result of SQL optimization.
config.workspace.default.title: Default Workspace
config.workspace.default.markdownDescrip: Configure the default workspace that will be used when opening new files
config.workspace.default.workspaceId.des: Unique identifier for the default workspace
config.workspace.default.workspaceId.mar: A unique identifier that represents your default workspace
config.workspace.default.workspaceName.m: Display name for your default workspace
config.workspace.default.dbType.markdown: The type of database used in this workspace (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite)
config.workspace.default.dbHost.markdown: The host address where your database is running
config.workspace.default.dbPort.markdown: The port number on which your database is listening
config.workspace.fileMapping.title: File Workspace Mapping
config.workspace.fileMapping.markdownDes: Configure which workspace should be used for specific files or file patterns
views.welcome.noConfiguration:
$(gear) No configuration found.

[Configure Now](command:pawsql.openSettings)

Click to setup your configuration.
views.welcome.noWorkspace:
No workspace found.

[Create Now](command:pawsql.createWorkspace)

Click to create your workspace.
